Class Suggestion

  • Constructor Details

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(Camp camp, Student author, String description, int changeCategory, String change, SuggestionStatus status)
      Suggestion constructor. Fills in all relevant fields with some extra behaviour.
      An APPROVED Suggestion being constructed directly credits 2 points to the author. (1 for suggestion, 1 for accepting)
      Any other Suggestion credits 1 point for its creation.
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp Object that the Suggestion is for
      author - Student who authored the Suggestion
      description - String explaining the rationale of the Suggestion
      changeCategory - Integer to select the category to change
      change - The String containing the value to change to
      status - The SuggestionStatus of the Suggestion.

  • Method Details

    • getChange

      public String getChange()
      Fetch the String change value
      Returns:
      String of change value

    • setChange

      public void setChange(String change)
      Set the String change value
      Parameters:
      change - New String for change value

    • getChangeCategory

      public int getChangeCategory()
      Fetch the integer of the change category
      Returns:
      Integer changeCategory

    • setChangeCategory

      public void setChangeCategory(int changeCategory)
      Set the change category
      Parameters:
      changeCategory - Integer corresponding to the new category

    • getStatus

      public SuggestionStatus getStatus()
      Fetch the SuggestionStatus of the Suggestion
      Returns:
      SuggestionStatus of the Suggestion

    • reject

      public void reject()
      Rejects a Suggestion. Only sets SuggestionStatus to REJECTED.
      Record of the Suggestion persists for report generation and for points tallying.

    • accept

      public void accept()
      Accepts a Suggestion. Sets SuggestionStatus to ACCEPTED.
      Credits only 1 point in this instance because the program state already credited the author with 1 point for the creation of the Suggestion.
      Record of the Suggestion persists for report generation and for points tallying.
